text: And it came to pass 11. 11 Gr. after the morrow.on the morrow, that Saul 11. 11 Gr. put.divided the people into three companies, and they go into the midst of the camp in the morning watch, and they smote the children of Ammon until the day was hot; and it came to pass that those who were left were scattered, and there were not left among them two together.
